'World should have listened to WHO' on virus: director tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735824 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/735824/world-should-have-listened-to-who-on-virus-director/story/ The World Health Organization's director-general said Monday that the agency had sounded the highest level of alarm over the novel coronavirus early on, but lamented that not all countries had heeded its advice. PHL Embassy sa London, kinalampag ang FCO ng UK para sa kaligtasan ng Pinoy health workers doon tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735817 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/735817/phl-embassy-sa-london-kinalampag-ang-fco-ng-uk-para-sa-kaligtasan-ng-pinoy-health-workers-doon/story/ Dahil sa dumadaming frontliners na Pinoy health workers sa United Kingdom na tinatamaan ng COVID-19, kinalampag na ng Philippine Embassy sa London ang Foreign and Commonwealth Office (FCO) doon. Duterte urges folk who still have no COVID-19 aid to complain tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735812 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/735812/duterte-urges-folk-who-still-have-no-covid-19-aid-to-complain/story/ "'Yung hindi pa nakatanggap, let us know by radio or what, magreklamo kayo sa radio station, barangay captain then the mayor," Duterte said in his address before the country."Mag-report kayo diyan and it's a matter of using a cellphone. The governor just ask… kung sino pa ang hindi nabigyan kasi pagbigyan namin lahat," he added. Mon, 27 Apr 2020 23:17:16 +0800
